pageContent: Objectives: To examine quality of life (QOL) for 3 years after radical retropubic prostatectomy (RRP) or permanent prostate brachytherapy (PPB) and to determine differences between the two procedures.

metaData.source:
Development and evaluation of a prostate sexual rehabilitation clinic: a pilot project
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16287458/
